original_text: Some of you say, ‘Today or tomorrow we will go to a certain city. We will stay there for a year. We will buy and sell things, and we will become rich.’ If you say things like that, listen to me.
korean_text: 들으라 너희 중에 말하기를 오늘이나 내일이나 우리가 어떤 도시에 가서 거기서 일 년을 머물며 장사하여 이익을 보리라 하는 자들아

sentences.original_text: Today or tomorrow we will go to a certain city
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘이나 내일 우리가 어떤 도시에 가서

sentences.original_text: We will stay there for a year
We will buy and sell things
If you say things like that
